Buscapè

  • contacts

Buscapè is located in Via Scarpa, right in the city centre of Modena and just a few steps from the Main square, Piazza Grande.

Here are two maps of the city centre, along with some other useful references. You can also get travelling directions based on your current location from Google Maps. Get Directions

  • BBuscapè
  • 1Duomo / Piazza Grande
  • 2Mercato Albinelli
  • 3Via Gallucci
  • 4Via Saragozza

The nearest and handiest car park is along Viale Rimembranze and Viale Martiri della Libertà (both highlighted in orange on the map)

Contact us
